      static void remove(android.view.View view)
      Removes the cheat sheet for the given view by removing the view's View.OnLongClickListener.

    • 构造器详细资料

    • 方法详细资料

      • setup

        public static void setup(android.view.View view)
        Sets up a cheat sheet (tooltip) for the given view by setting its View.OnLongClickListener. When the view is long-pressed, a Toast with the view's content description will be shown either above (default) or below the view (if there isn't room above it).
        参数:
        view - The view to add a cheat sheet for.

      • setup

        public static void setup(android.view.View view,
                         int textResId)
        Sets up a cheat sheet (tooltip) for the given view by setting its View.OnLongClickListener. When the view is long-pressed, a Toast with the given text will be shown either above (default) or below the view (if there isn't room above it).
        参数:
        view - The view to add a cheat sheet for.
        textResId - The string resource containing the text to show on long-press.

      • setup

        public static void setup(android.view.View view,
                         java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Sets up a cheat sheet (tooltip) for the given view by setting its View.OnLongClickListener. When the view is long-pressed, a Toast with the given text will be shown either above (default) or below the view (if there isn't room above it).
        参数:
        view - The view to add a cheat sheet for.
        text - The text to show on long-press.

      • remove

        public static void remove(android.view.View view)
        Removes the cheat sheet for the given view by removing the view's View.OnLongClickListener.
        参数:
        view - The view whose cheat sheet should be removed.
